item.title: Embedding Multimedia and More
item.description: There are 4 ways in LiaScript to embed multimedia content:

item.title: Embedding Multimedia - How does it work??
item.description: LiaScript has a new type of link. If you prefix a link in Markdown with an exclamation mark, then this link is marked as an image, and it gets embedded into the document.
